hypotheses.title: Identify Lateral Movement Using Unusual Admin Shares
hypotheses.action: Identify access to admin shares from non-standard accounts within the last 1h

sigma.yaml:
title: Access to Admin Shares by Uncommon Users
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 5140
    ShareName|contains: '\\ADMIN$'
  condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=main sourcetype=wineventlog EventID=5140 ShareName="*\\ADMIN$" | stats count by SubjectUserName, ComputerName | where count >= 3

methodologies_enriched.name: SMB/Windows Admin Shares
methodologies_enriched.description: Adversaries may use [Valid Accounts](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1078) to interact with a remote network share using Server Message Block (SMB). The adversary may then perform actions as the

hypotheses.title: Detect High Volume of Failed Logons
hypotheses.action: Monitor for accounts with ≥5 failed logon attempts within a 10m window

sigma.yaml:
title: High Volume Failed Logon Attempts
logsource:
  product: windows
  service: security
detection:
  selection:
    EventID: 4625
  condition: selection

splunk.spl: index=main sourcetype=wineventlog EventID=4625 | stats count by AccountName, ComputerName | where count >= 5
